original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ ummaddāpenti pi parimaddāpenti pi

original: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: manussā vihāra cārikam āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ ummaddāpessanti pi parimaddāpessanti pi seyyathāpi gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ ummaddāpessanti pi parimaddāpessanti pi iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ ummaddāpenti pi parimaddāpenti pi iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ ummaddāpessanti pi parimaddāpessanti pi
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyāḥ ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
